text: Ebenezer Baptist Church is a Baptist church in Atlanta, United States. It is part of the Progressive National Baptist Convention and American Baptist Churches USA. It was the church where Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. was co- pastor from 1960 until his assassination in 1968. The funerals of both Dr. King and congressman John Lewis were held here. United States Senator Raphael Warnock has been pastor since 2005. It is located in the historic area, now called the Martin Luther King Jr. National Historical Park. ==References== Category:Martin Luther King Jr. Category:Baptist churches Category:Churches in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Atlanta
title: Ebenezer Baptist Church
